blog.name: itsgameofthronesimagines
blog.title: Valar Morghulis
blog.description:
Welcome to my Game of Thrones Imagines blog! Here: ships, requests, and fun are all welcome here! One-shots, drabbles, imagines, fake instagram, incorrect quotes, theories, debates, ships, smut are also allowed! Send writing prompt and ship requests! Boy, Girl, etc. Imagines. All sexual orientation and personal likes are welcomed here! Enjoy! (Requests: OPEN!)
Prompts: http://writingexercises.co.uk/dialogue-generator.php

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary:
Robb: What on earth are you doing?
Jon: We're getting ready for bed.
Sansa: That's what she told us to do.
Robb: And since did...
body:
Robb: What on earth are you doing?

Jon: We’re getting ready for bed.

Sansa: That’s what she told us to do.

Robb: And since did we do what we were told?

Sansa: Since we nearly got Arya blown up and Rickon boiled!

reblog.comment:
Robb: What on earth are you doing?

Jon: We’re getting ready for bed.

Sansa: That’s what she told us to do.

Robb: And since did we do what we were told?

Sansa: Since we nearly got Arya blown up and Rickon boiled!

Robb: And since did we do what we were told?

Sansa: Since we nearly got Arya blown up and Rickon boiled!

Sansa: Since we nearly got Arya blown up and Rickon boiled!

summary: predictions & thoughts for season 8 - not spoiler free!!  feel free to reblog with your own thoughts & predictions. rude...
body:
predictions & thoughts for season 8 - not spoiler free!! 

feel free to reblog with your own thoughts & predictions. rude comments / ship wars will be ignored because thats not what this is about. there’s been a lot of ~heat~ in the got fandom this week but at the end of the day… we’re all fans of the same show. we may not like the same characters, ships, ect but we’re all human and should be able to get along. if not, again, im just gonna ignore you lol 

- jonsa is end game & the north will break from the seven kingdoms. “king & queen in the north”

- davos will be hand to jon. 

- arya, brienne, and jaime will serve as the “queen’s guard” if jaime does live. 

- gendry will be revealed to be robert & cersei’s true born child, he will rule as the King of the Iron Throne (if NOT i default back to Jon ruling but i really, really dont think he would TRULY want that) 

- the fight against the night king is the TRUE end fight and will be the focus of the season. i think the solution to the iron throne will be solved before the battle. dany agrees to help despite finding out about jon and gendry because she thinks it will solidify her claim. she knows she cant win the throne without the backing of the people and this is the best way to prove to everyone that she’s the true heir and the rightful queen. but…

- dany will die in the fight against the night king. i imagine her being gravely injured and succumbing to her wounds back at winterfell. also thought about her dying of that disease targs get when they go north, but thats too fucking easy and i want her to go out in glory. i think its going to be caused by a mistake of some kind- a battle plan gone wrong (or ignored) and she thinks her remaining dragons will keep her safe. but they wont. 

- cersei will die in childbirth, along with her child. 

- i do believe there will be a kidnapping plot. i cant say if it will come through (perhaps a failed attempt) but it will be brought up. cersei still believes sansa is responsible for joffrey’s death and wont rest until she’s taken care of. 

- ghost survives (i refuse to accept anything else) and so does nymeria but she continues to live with her new pack of wolves.

- dont ask me what i think bran will do because i honestly dont know lmao but i know he lives. 

- sam will become the maester for winterfell / king’s landing based on where jon ends up. he and gilly get a happily ever after with baby sam & maybe even a child of their own. 

- dumb red bitch will finally get whats coming to her.  hopefully its davos. 

- tyrion will not betray dany, but he will break truce with her (maybe thats the same thing, especially in her eyes). i dont foresee him living. i always did, truly i did, but now im not so sure?? i think if jaime lives, tyrion dies and vice versa. i only imagine one lannister will be left living at the end. 

- the ending scene will be of jon. it might include sansa, it might not. its definitely going to be jon at the end though. has to be, right???

thats all i have for now.

im excited to see what anyone else has to share!!

blog.name: thequeenofhades
blog.title: "...then I wake up, like a thief of dreams."
blog.description: Elizabeth. 33. Writer. We are stardust my darling, we have galaxies in our hearts.

title: 6SS: SanSan: Dreams III
body:
The fog is thick and she can’t see where she is going, the sun’s light is poor, barely noticeable and the only thing it does is to give the fog a pale grey shade, she’s been wondering for what it feels hours and she is starting to feel scared and suddenly, a voice whispers, “Come child, come, do not be afraid, he is waiting.”

A shiver goes down her spine, “Who are you?”

“Little Bird?!” A voice cries out, “Little Bird, is that you?! Where are you?!”

“Ser! Thank the Gods, I am here,” she runs, looking in every direction she can, looking for him, “Sandor where are you? I am scared.”

Out of nowhere, a pair of arms catches her, she’s about to scream when she sees it’s him, “You are safe Little Bird,” his voice is raspy, “I will keep you safe now.”

Relief comes in strong waves, she believes him, she knows he will keep to his word, so she simply allows herself to be held and whispers, “I know, thank you.”

summary:
I would like to go ahead and put forward Skyscraper by Demi Lovato as the official Jonsa fight song against the antis.
‘Go on...
body:
I would like to go ahead and put forward Skyscraper by Demi Lovato as the official Jonsa fight song against the antis.

‘Go on and try to tear me down
I will be rising from the ground
Like a skyscraper’

All those in favor say aye

blog.name: tluohsalohcin
blog.title: Justice for Jon Snow and Jaime Lannister
blog.description: Official member of the Sansa Stark Defense Squad. Certified Jonsa Trash. Also a Nick Hoult loyalist since 2011.

summary: It is very obvious by now that this generation still isn't ready for more characters in literature/movies/tv like Sansa Stark:...
body: It is very obvious by now that this generation still isn’t ready for more characters in literature/movies/tv like Sansa Stark: traditionally feminine but never sexualized and without traditionally masculine traits like being physically strong or knowing how to fight; actually speaking her mind and being cold when it is necessary; not owing something to men and being an actual benevolent and caring leader; never entitled and using actual reasons to prove anyone otherwise.

reblog.comment: It is very obvious by now that this generation still isn’t ready for more characters in literature/movies/tv like Sansa Stark: traditionally feminine but never sexualized and without traditionally masculine traits like being physically strong or knowing how to fight; actually speaking her mind and being cold when it is necessary; not owing something to men and being an actual benevolent and caring leader; never entitled and using actual reasons to prove anyone otherwise.

blog.name: kissed-by-circe
blog.title: and the skies were crying gold
blog.description: Laura. 22. She/Her. Jonsa. The Tudors. Everything fluffy and pink❤️🦄

summary:
The blood under their sharp fingernails and the seal brown 
feathers that look like Myranda wove them into her dark curls remind...
caption:
The blood under their sharp fingernails and the seal brown feathers that look like Myranda wove them into her dark curls remind her of that, and of the darker nights that she wants to forget so very badly. But the sun is already rising behind the mountains, its pale golden fingers caressing the dusty glass of the wide windows, and the night will end soon enough.

XXX

S06E10 / S07E03 / S07E07

tags: I’m hoping her storyline is both thick and interesting.
summary: Honestly the reason this season’s promos has been Sansa heavy is because she is now another warrior lady that will wear an armor...
question: Honestly the reason this season’s promos has been Sansa heavy is because she is now another warrior lady that will wear an armor at some point (approved by Sophie Turner). Her unique traits are slowly taken from her and I don’t know how anybody who loves Sansa can be happy with what the show is doing with her.
answer:
I kind of agree and I also disagree. D&D never cared for the more feminine aspects of Sansa which is why her courtesy, knowledge and skills have been reduced down greatly. She’s naive and she knows how to knit, that’s all that’s been retained. Many people still don’t know how many things Sansa was good at. They also reduced the influence of songs and culture so you don’t get why Sansa was raised in that manner. I also don’t like how they remove her many acts of resistance just to develop other characters. I love her relationships with Shae and Margaery but I’d rather they didn’t happen as long as Sansa can be shown to have grown since her father was killed. Sansa was too open and too naive around them. She told Margaery about Joffrey twice in the books and it was brave because it was a risk and it developed both characters in a way that didn’t regress Sansa. She never spoke to her maids except to order them because she suspected they’re Cersei’s spies. While Sansa was abused on the show, D&D toned down a lot of the tragedy in her arc. Losing her childhood isn’t great, snarky lines are great but speaking diplomatically and/or kindly is great too. So yeah show Sansa isn’t as complex as book Sansa and D&D have made an effort to distance her from feminine feelings and acts.

At the same time Sansa has the fourth most screen time in the entire show. She has been steadily building her resume and she has the most connections to other characters (dead or alive). This season will focus on Winterfell and King’s Landing. Sansa is Lady of Winterfell and if we believe Sophie (I do), she’s both self assured, passionate and ready to put everything she’s been taught to practice. She’s prominent in the teasers because she’s likely prominent in the season.

summary: Yo I have a question, why was Jon held as the ruler for the Starks (King In The North)? Like I honestly have no clue? Battle of...
question: Yo I have a question, why was Jon held as the ruler for the Starks (King In The North)? Like I honestly have no clue? Battle of the Bastards? Technically Sansa won that. I mean yeah Jon is Ned’a child, but you know who else is Ned’s child? Sansa.
answer:
So D&D envisioned Jon being crowned in 6x10, instead of making sure he earned it, they essentially wrote him being hesitant while Sansa pushed for it. They wrote them going to other houses for help and Sansa trying to convince them (Jon tried but not as hard) with Davos doing a lot of the work and finally Sansa wrote to Littlefinger. While Jon brought the wildlings, it was the Vale knights who won the battle and they came because of Sansa. In fact Jon was actively losing because he was tricked by Ramsay like Sansa said he would be and Ramsay was able to use his superior numbers to essentially trap Jon’s army. Again Sansa told him that a smaller army would be a problem even though she’s not a military strategist and that they should try to recruit more people. Jon was right they couldn’t wait but they still validated Sansa. Finally Sansa executed Ramsay herself.

Then Jon was crowned. He was given full credit for the battle and avenging the Red Wedding. Despite his bastard status being a big deal, he was crowned over a trueborn daughter. In season 7, they used the fact that Sansa should have been crowned to villainise her which is great.

summary: Why is it Sansa's duty to be close to Arya and Jon anyway? What's so special about their friendship? They could have tried to be...
question: Why is it Sansa's duty to be close to Arya and Jon anyway? What's so special about their friendship? They could have tried to be bffs with her any time and didn't but only Sansa is blamed. I also love the idea that his little 11 y/o sister "bullied" him, I see Sansa waving her needle at Jon as he cowers in a corner, taller than her with a sword at his hip
answer:
Anon, my friend, I have been baffled by this for a long time. How is Sansa prioritising her interests are a moral failure? She likes singing, writing poetry, playing instruments, learning how to be lady, knitting, etc. which Arya and Jon have shown little interest in. So why should she meet them in the middle? Arya prefers exploring and rough housing, Sansa doesn’t. It’s that simple. You can’t even use the excuse that Sansa excluded Arya because in her first chapter she invited Arya to do something she likes, Arya wasn’t interested and Sansa was clearly hurt ( “Lady and I will eat all the lemon cakes and just have the best time without you.”). Contrary to popular belief, Sansa would have been delighted if Arya cared about some of the things she likes. It’s one of the reasons Sansa was drawn to Margaery.

As for Jon, Sansa chose her mother and I can’t blame her. We know Catelyn went through a lot of emotional pain because Ned was an insensitive prick chose to keep Jon close without an explanation. We also know Catelyn responded to this by being cold and distant towards Jon. So Sansa has a choice, please the only parent who pays any attention to her or Jon, who again she has little in common with (and even if they shared something they would have drifted apart like Sansa and Robb did). That was not a moral failing. As for Sansa calling him a bastard, she did it once and don’t forget that even in their thoughts, his siblings thought of him like that. Jon never once mentioned Sansa calling him anything but half brother and he seems to remember a few pleasant memories of her. 

Once again, it’s normal not being close with your siblings. Some of y’all need to get out more and maybe talk to people who have siblings.

Bran: I know, I saw you.
